dimensions.label: Approach to Science
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle scientific discoveries?

options.description: Your FarTwin will enthusiastically welcome and explore scientific findings, recognizing their potential for progress.
Your FarTwin will approach scientific discoveries with caution, questioning the evidence and methodology before accepting new ideas.

dimensions.label: Emotional Expression
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin express emotions?

options.description: Your FarTwin will freely and honestly express their feelings, using words to convey emotions.
Your FarTwin will keep their emotions private, only sharing them with trusted individuals or through subtle nonverbal cues.

dimensions.label: Conflict Resolution
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin resolve conflicts?

options.description: Your FarTwin will confront and challenge opposing views with assertive arguments, aiming to 'win' the argument.
Your FarTwin will seek common ground by listening actively and finding mutually beneficial solutions that satisfy both parties.

dimensions.label: Social Interaction
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin engage with social groups?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be outgoing, assertive, and seek opportunities to connect with new people in a social setting.
Your FarTwin will prefer quieter settings, observing from a distance before participating in conversations or engaging in one-on-one interactions.

dimensions.label: Risk Tolerance
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach risk?

options.description: Your FarTwin will actively seek out and pursue new, untested experiences with a sense of excitement and anticipation.
Your FarTwin will carefully weigh the potential risks and benefits before making decisions or taking action.

dimensions.label: Decision-Making
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin make decisions?

options.description: Your FarTwin will analyze data and use objective criteria to arrive at a well-reasoned decision.
Your FarTwin will trust their instincts, relying on emotional insight and personal values to guide their choices.

dimensions.label: Feedback Reception
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin respond to criticism or feedback?

options.description: Your FarTwin will become dismissive or hostile when confronted with negative comments, feeling personally attacked.
Your FarTwin will acknowledge and consider constructive criticism, using it as an opportunity to learn and grow.

dimensions.label: Personal Growth
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin prioritize personal development?

options.description: Your FarTwin will actively pursue knowledge, skills, and experiences aimed at self-improvement and advancement.
Your FarTwin will take time to introspect, evaluating their thoughts, emotions, and actions to identify areas for growth and self-awareness.
